questions.question: Is Finwise secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption to protect your data and never store your login information. Plus, our biometric authentication adds an extra layer of security.

questions.question: Can I use Finwise on multiple devices?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Your Finwise account syncs seamlessly across all your devices - smartphone, tablet, and computer.

questions.question: Can I connect all my bank accounts?
questions.answer: Yes! Finwise supports connections with over 10,000 financial institutions worldwide. Simply log in through our secure portal to link your accounts.

questions.question: Do I need any financial expertise to use the investing features?
questions.answer: Not at all! Our expert-curated portfolios and educational resources make investing accessible to everyone, regardless of experience level.

questions.question: What if I need help using the app?
questions.answer: Our dedicated support team is available 24/7 via chat or email. Plus, we offer extensive in-app tutorials and a comprehensive knowledge base to help you make the most of Finwise.
